description: A dashboard to display data exported by Speedtest Tracker

targets.query:
from(bucket: "speedtest-tracker-new")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "download_bits")
  |> drop(columns: ["server_host","server_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "speedtest-tracker-new")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "upload_bits")
  |> drop(columns: ["server_host","server_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "speedtest-tracker-new")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ping")
  |> drop(columns: ["server_host","server_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "speedtest-tracker-new")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ping_jitter")
  |> drop(columns: ["server_host","server_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "speedtest-tracker-new")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "packet_loss")
  |> drop(columns: ["server_host","server_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "speedtest-tracker-new")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "download_bits" or r["_field"] == "upload_bits")
  |> drop(columns: ["server_host","server_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "speedtest-tracker-new")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ping")
  |> drop(columns: ["server_host","server_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

from(bucket: "speedtest-tracker-new")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "ping_jitter" or r["_field"] == "download_jitter" or r["_field"] == "upload_jitter")
  |> drop(columns: ["server_host","server_name"])
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.description: Shows the avg speeds received by server

targets.query:
from(bucket: "speedtest-tracker-new")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "download_bits" or r["_field"] == "id" or r["_field"] == "ping" or r["_field"] == "scheduled" or r["_field"] == "server_host" or r["_field"] == "server_id" or r["_field"] == "server_name" or r["_field"] == "upload_bits" or r["_field"] == "ping_jitter" or r["_field"] == "packet_loss")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

panels.title: Avg. Speed by Server

targets.query:
from(bucket: "speedtest-tracker-new")
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "speedtest")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "download" or r["_field"] == "download_bits" or r["_field"] == "download_jitter" or r["_field"] == "id" or r["_field"] == "packet_loss" or r["_field"] == "ping" or r["_field"] == "ping_jitter" or r["_field"] == "scheduled" or r["_field"] == "server_host" or r["_field"] == "server_id" or r["_field"] == "server_name" or r["_field"] == "upload" or r["_field"] == "upload_bits" or r["_field"] == "upload_jitter")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: last, createEmpty: false)
  |> yield(name: "last")

title: Speedtest Tracker v2 - InfluxDBv2
